title: Warriors (Imagine Dragons song)
content: "Warriors" is a song by American pop rock band Imagine Dragons, used by Riot Games for a music video promoting the League of Legends 2014 World Championship.[1] It was also included on the band's second studio album, Smoke + Mirrors. The song was released digitally as a single on September 18, 2014.[2] The music video for the song was the most viewed League of Legends video online with over 200 million views, until K/DA's Pop/Stars surpassed it in 2019.[3] The song was also used as the official theme of the 2015 FIFA Women's World Cup.
